title: ZELDA: BREATH OF THE WILD HALLOWEEN ARTWORK RELEASED
content:
The official Japanese Zelda Twitter account just released some new The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild art in the spirit of Halloween.
It's a small (yet quite beautiful) update from the social team behind the upcoming game, which recently enjoyed a bunch of fresh attention thanks to three brand new trailers and a blog post suggesting some sort of link with 1986's The Legend of Zelda.
